stakeholders.name: Example Person 1
stakeholders.notes: Background information about this person and your relationship with them.
stakeholders.interactionTips: Best way to reach them, communication preferences, etc.

stakeholders.name: Example Person 2
stakeholders.notes: This person actively champions your work to others.
stakeholders.interactionTips: Responds well to data and concrete examples.

stakeholders.name: Example Person 3
stakeholders.notes: Has authority to approve or block major initiatives.
stakeholders.interactionTips: Schedule meetings well in advance. Bring executive summaries.
